testcase.name: should derive a BEM compliant className for a passed nested element key
should derive a BEM compliant className for a passed modifier key
should derive not include modifiers of parents elements in nested class names
should not return a className when no className has been set in the props
should not generate additional class names for modifiers if selectedKeys contain element keys
should return the original className when selectedKeys is not specified or empty
should correctly merge modifiers with existing classNames
